Address.label: Address
Address.value: IDA BUSINESS PARK,BRAY, CO. WICKLOW, DUBLIN, Ireland

Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Biotechnology: In Vitro & In Vivo Diagnostic Substances

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Trinity Biotech PLC is in the business of development, manufacturing, and marketing clinical diagnostic products for clinical laboratory and point of care sections of the diagnostic market. Its products are used to detect autoimmune, infectious, sexually transmitted diseases, diabetes, and disorders of the liver and intestine. The company also provides raw materials to the life sciences and research industries globally. It markets products under the brand names Recombigen, Unigold, MarBlot, Mardx, Premier, Immublot, EZ, Capita, and others. Geographically, it has two segments namely the Americas, and Ireland of which it derives a majority of its revenues from the Americas segment.
